thread.title: The 6 Sneakers Footwear Designer Jon Buscemi is Wearing Right Now
thread.title_full: The 6 Sneakers Footwear Designer Jon Buscemi is Wearing Right Now

author: Chris Danforth
title: The 6 Sneakers Footwear Designer Jon Buscemi is Wearing Right Now
text:
You probably already know sneaker maestro Jon Buscemi through his luxury-inspired Buscemi footwear brand, more specifically the 100mm silhouette that comes with a keyed lock, a favorite of Gucci Mane and Kylie Jenner.
Now Buscemi himself explains his current sneaker rotation, which expectedly contains a few of his own designs. Starting with the Buscemi Gladiator, which takes cues from moccasin styles. Jon then moves on to the pared-down Wooster in white, made by Greats.
The selection of sneakers is rounded out by inclusions from Supreme, Nike and more, which you can check out above for yourself.
Now, dive into more original content from Highsnobiety â€˜s YouTube channel.
